# Studded leather
## Overview
Similar to leather armor, this suit is reinforced with small metal studs.


-tx-
| |  | **Armor/** | **Maximum** | **Armor** |  |  ||  |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| |  | **Shield** | **Dex** | **Check** | **Arcane Spell** | **Speed** ||  |
| **Armor** | **Cost** | **Bonus** | **Bonus** | **Penalty** | **Failure Chance** | **30 ft.** | **20 ft.** | **Weight** |
| *Light armor* |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Studded leather | 25 gp | +3 | +5 | -1 | 15% | 30 ft. | 20 ft. | 20 lbs. |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. xxx
